long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Implements an automated scrolling feature for YouTube Shorts videos.

Features:
1.Automatic shorts scrolling
2.Skipping short one sec forward/backward with arrow keys [<-] [->] (Youtube Short Navigation)
3.Brings back the progress bar

Updates:
v1.0.2 - extension published
v1.0.3 - bug fixes connected to skipping video (forward/backward)
v1.0.3 - icon update due to copyright
